src_original: śambhu śaṅkara śuddhārtha buddhapadma namo 'stu te // 5 //
tgt_original: śambhu śaṅkara śuddhārtha buddhapadma namo'stu te || 5 ||

src_original: buddhasatva susatvāgrya dharmasatva susatvadhṛk /  satvottama susatvajña satvasatva namo 'stu te // 7 //
tgt_original: buddhasattva susattvāgrya dharmasattva susattvadhṛk |  sattvottama susattvajña sattvasattva namo'stu te || 7 ||
